sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Update default template for OOTB topics</description> <name>Update template for OOTB topics</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('topic'); gr.addNullQuery('template'); gr.query(); while(gr.next()){ gr.setValue('template','4fb26c9cc3d030102ec1a589a840ddbd'); gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-12-08 07:08:10</sys_created_on> <sys_id>dc8df92df49c0d10f877f91bb76e1867</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update template for OOTB topics</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Employee Center" source="sn_ex_sp">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_dc8df92df49c0d10f877f91bb76e1867</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-12-08 07:30:05</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
